description: Indicates no K applied from 1962 to 1980. Basal K fertilizer applied to all plots 1981 onward.

Factor level shows annual K applied from 1962 to 1980. 104 or 105 kgKha-1 except in 1968 and 1974 (156kgK applied, potatoes grown) and 1969, 1979, 1980 (none applied, fallow), see k_rate. Basal K fertilizer applied to all plots 1981 onwards.
